Question: What is the person drinking out of?

Reference Answer: cup

Image path: ./sampled_GQA/517987.jpg

Original program:

```
BOX0=LOC(image=IMAGE,object='person')
IMAGE0=CROP_BELOW(image=IMAGE,box=BOX0)
BOX1=LOC(image=IMAGE0,object='cup')
ANSWER0=COUNT(box=BOX1)
ANSWER1=EVAL(expr="'cup' if {ANSWER0} > 0 else 'bottle'")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER1)
```
Program:

```
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE,question="What is the person drinking out of?")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='What is the person drinking out of?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>cup</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>cup</span></b></div><hr>

Answer: cup
